item.arche.montana_hat.lore:
The stylish hat of the legendary archaeologist, Montana Rick.

Montana took vigilant care to never lose sight of his hat - as you place it on your head, visions of undiscovered treasures and the rush of adventure fill your mind. Its close attachment to his person must have imbued it with remnants of his love of archaeology, a love which you clearly share. You will find yourself digging at a slightly faster pace when worn.

 What could have behooved him to leave it behind - was it resignation, or a terrible fate? Furthermore, what are the odds that it would end up in your hands after a lifetime of adventure and discovery across the wide world?
